ttp_template:
<group name="flags_index_interface_ip_address">
Flags: X - disabled, I - invalid, H - {{FLAGS | ORPHRASE}}HCP, D - dynamic, P - published, C - complete 
 0 D  {{INDEX | ORPHRASE}}85.163.212.158  dmz-1-vlan  
 1  {{IP_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} {{MAC_ADDRESS | re("[0-9a-fA-F:.-]+")}} {{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}  
</group>
cli_content:
Flags: X - disabled, I - invalid, H - DHCP, D - dynamic, P - published, C - complete 
 #    ADDRESS         MAC-ADDRESS       INTERFACE                                                                                                                                                      
 0 D  185.163.212.158                   dmz-1-vlan                                                                                                                                                     
17:20:06 echo: system,error,critical login failure for user admin from 65.160.140.13 via ssh
 1    185.163.212.159 AF:D6:C8:F2:36:16 vlan-2
textfsm_template:
Value Key INDEX (\d+)
Value FLAGS ([XIHDPC]+)
Value IP_ADDRESS (\S+)
Value MAC_ADDRESS (([0-9a-fA-F]{2}[:]){5}([0-9a-fA-F]{2}))
Value INTERFACE (\S+)

Start
  ^\s*#\s*ADDRESS\s*MAC-ADDRESS\s*INTERFACE\s*$$ -> EntriesTable

EntriesTable
  ^\s*${INDEX}\s*(${FLAGS})?\s*${IP_ADDRESS}\s*(${MAC_ADDRESS})?\s+(${INTERFACE})?\s*$$ -> Record
  ^\s*(?:\d{2}:){2}\d{2}\s+echo:\s*.*$$ -> Next
  ^. -> Error
